Description.Text:
Position Hotel Athena is situated a few steps from the beach and set in green surroundings.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment: 2002.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. At lunch and dinner: choice between 4 menus with mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
Accepted credit cards: Eurocard/Mastercard + Visa.
Swimming-pool opened from 08/06/13 to 07/09/13 from 8.00am to 1.00pm and from 4.00pm to 8.00pm.
From 18/05/13 to 02/08/13 and from 24/08/13 to 13/09/13 the prices include beach service with 1 sun umbrella + 2 sun bed per room (for single room 1 sun umbrella + 1 sun bed).
The hotel organize once a week parties in from 08/06/13 to 24/08/13.
From 01/06/13 to 01/09/13 Miniclub for children from 3 years, daily in the morning and in the afternoon but not on sunday!
Check In from midday. Check Out until 10.00am.
